statements: DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Credit Card Fraud';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE fraud_level > 5 AND activity_type = 'Identity Theft';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_users WHERE is_suspected_fraudster = true;
DELETE FROM fraud_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Suspicious' AND activity_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 100 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM fraud_reports WHERE report_author = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM fraudulent_participants WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
